item.title: Disagreement between two kidney function tests predicts serious health problems
item.description: A mismatch between two common tests for kidney function may indicate a higher risk for kidney failure, heart disease, and death, a new study shows.

item.title: White House strikes deals for lower prices on obesity drugs
item.description: Medicare beneficiaries will soon be able to get obesity and Type 2 diabetes drugs for a $50 copay. But there are some limitations.
